name: GridReferenceFinder
0:
”Alexa, ask grid reference finder to find me the Grid Reference for Macclesfield”
”What is the OS Grid Reference of Stonehenge”
”Give me the Irish Grid Reference for Dublin”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: grid reference finder
des: Use the Grid Reference Finder app to find out the GB or Irish National Grid Reference for a location, so that you can locate the said place on an Ordnance Survey (OS) or Ordnance Survey Ireland (OSI / OSNI) map.
